about_the_game:
John Lemon falls into a strange world of full of monster lemons, while chasing after the ghost of his beloved Liz Lemon. The pressure is on as you leak juice, your life force draining out. Run and jump through levels, exploding enemies on the way, using their juice as your life force.

Features:


  • No saves in the game, to beat the final boss you have to do so starting each session at level 1.
  • Pick up seeds to use as ammunition to spit at enemies.
  • Power ups such as lemon cake heal you and Hot Sauce makes you run fast.
  • Unfolding story across 12 animated chapters.
  • Kill monsters for their juice, before your own runs out.
  • Final Boss.
  • Traps and power-ups to challenge your survival.
  • 12 levels and more than 10 monsters types, each with their unique attack styles.
detailed_description:
John Lemon falls into a strange world of full of monster lemons, while chasing after the ghost of his beloved Liz Lemon. The pressure is on as you leak juice, your life force draining out. Run and jump through levels, exploding enemies on the way, using their juice as your life force.

Features:


  • No saves in the game, to beat the final boss you have to do so starting each session at level 1.
  • Pick up seeds to use as ammunition to spit at enemies.
  • Power ups such as lemon cake heal you and Hot Sauce makes you run fast.
  • Unfolding story across 12 animated chapters.
  • Kill monsters for their juice, before your own runs out.
  • Final Boss.
  • Traps and power-ups to challenge your survival.
  • 12 levels and more than 10 monsters types, each with their unique attack styles.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 15.04 or later
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX with latest NVIDIA binary drivers
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 15.04 or later
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or higher with latest NVIDIA binary drivers
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.2 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 440 GT or AMD Radeon 5670 HD (minimum 1GB)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.2 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or i7 2.4GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Lemons Must Die

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit Service Pack 1
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 440 GT or AMD Radeon 5670 HD (minimum 1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

short_description: Get John Lemon through strange worlds and save Liz Lemon from the monstrous creatures who have taken her!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
